title: StandardRadioButtons Component
description: A customizable radio button group component supporting horizontal or vertical layout, two variants ('default' and 'icon'), optional tooltips, and animated feedback when selecting options without icons.

propsList.name: options
propsList.type: Array<{ value: string | number, label?: string, icon?: ReactNode }>
propsList.description: List of radio options to display, each with a value and optional label and icon.

propsList.name: selectedValue
propsList.description: Currently selected value of the radio group.

propsList.name: onChange
propsList.description: Callback fired when the selected option changes, receiving the new value.

propsList.name: label
propsList.description: Optional group label displayed above the radio buttons.

propsList.name: layout
propsList.description: Layout direction of the radio buttons.

propsList.name: tooltip
propsList.description: Optional tooltip text shown on mouse hover (desktop only).

propsList.name: variant
propsList.description: Visual style variant. 'default' uses classic radio circles and labels; 'icon' uses icons with wiggle animation on selection if no icon is provided.
